snippet: The government-controlled mortgage finance giant, posted net income of $227 million for the fourth quarter, down sharply from the same period of 2013.
abstract: Freddie Mac reports fourth-quarter net income of $227 million; reports 2014 income of $7.7 billion, down from $48.7 billion in 2013.
lead_paragraph: The government-controlled mortgage finance giant, posted net income of $227 million for the fourth quarter, down sharply from the same period of 2013.

headline.print_headline: Freddie Mac’s Profit Plummets on $3.4 Billion Hedge Loss
headline.main: Freddie Mac’s Profit Plummets on $3.4. Billion Hedge Loss
